divs: Sighting Detailsi woke up my brother and ask him what it was with amazement he simply said that he didnt know and went back to sleep.when i turned and looked again the lights started to glow pretty bright and suddenlyvanished.ive had a recent encounter again in 1999 even more confusing ive only told two people.it would be nice to get some insight on what i experienced.please contact me.
Summary: I was sleep one night when I was awakened to see a diamond shape series of lights above the door frame and below the ceiling.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around March 15th 1974
